title: D I L: Deeply in Love
description: The Creator is unique, unfathomable, formless, and without any attributes. After searching everywhere, I first found it in myself, and then I found it, all prevalent and timeless, in every Creation of the Creator. This book is the author's attempt to reach out to all people in the entire world, irrespective of age, to help them connect with their own self.
author: Neena Paul
